item.title: MIUI V14.0.3.0.TLDMIXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 12X Global
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X Global

Codename: psyche

Version: V14.0.3.0.TLDMIXM | 13.0

Size: 3.9 GB

MD5: 1b52040940ef567254c047b5833d2d18

Changelog:
[MIUI 14]
Attention to detail redefines personalization and brings it to a new level.
MIUI uses less memory now and keeps being swift and responsive over much more extended periods.
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 13
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2023. Increased system security.
[Basic experience]
MIUI uses less memory now and keeps being swift and responsive over much more extended periods.
[Personalization]
New widget formats allow more combinations, making your experience even more convenient.
Home screen folders will highlight the apps you need most making them just one tap away from you.
[More features and improvements]
Search in Settings is now more advanced. With search history and categories in results, everything looks much crisper now.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V13.0.15.0.RLDCNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 12X China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X China

Codename: psyche

Version: V13.0.15.0.RLDCNXM | 11.0

Size: 4.0 GB

MD5: fb4835c8a49f12e894ed1dfb8ff482c5

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2022. Increased system security.
[Camera]
Fix: Camera app force closed in some cases when front camera was used
[Gallery]
Fix: Photos couldn't be viewed in Gallery in some cases
[Other]
Optimization: Auto brightness
Fix: Device couldn't be fully charged in some cases

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
